metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5545 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - negligible
metadata.Description:
The main function in plistutil.c in libimobiledevice libplist through 1.12allows attackers to obtain sensitive information from process memory orcause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via Apple Property List datathat is too short.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5545` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
